attributes.action: Remove people from F65 in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Under the World Health Organisation (WHO) all the people in the UK are into Fetishes, BDSM etc. diagnoses of Fetishism (F65.0), Fetishistic Transvestism (F65.1), and Sadomasochism (F65.5) and thus all people are classed as being disturbed or mentally ill.

Therefore this petition for the UK government and follow Norway etc. in removing people from the F65.0, F65.1 and F65.5 categories.

Definition:

Fetishism: the attribution of religious or mystical qualities to inanimate objects e.g. a car lover has a fetish, a clothes lover has a fetish and so on.
